text: Amir Alagić (born 5 March 1960) is a Bosnian professional football manager. He also holds an Australian citizenship. He is currently the head coach of the Sri Lanka national team. ==Managerial career== Alagić was started his coaching career in 1996 and managed clubs in Europe and Asia. He also managed Bosnia and Herzegovina U19. In 2020, he appointed as the manager of Sri Lanka national team. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina football managers Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina emigrants to Australia
title: Amir Alagić
